General.Name: Yonga Mobilya Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Yonga Mobilya Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures, sells, and exports furniture in Turkey. The company offers dresser units, dining benches, TV stands, coffee tables, sideboard, bookcases with cupboards, dining tables, side tables, book cases, bench, bookshelf display units, tables, console tables, sofa side tables, tallboy chests and mirrors, highboards, wardrobes, shelving units, beds, desks, storage benches, and bedside and dressing tables. It also provides lamp tables, display cabinets, bureaus, bedside cabinets, table stools, wine racks, trunks, door glazed tops, chest, corner desks, home office desks and shelving unit, office filing units, tall glazed units, standalone mirrors, folding wardrobe, and media units. The company offers its products under the Audely, Duhrer, Shalstone, Bosco, Teramo, Design Project, Sonoma, Colby, Stockholm, and Marque Furniture names. It also operates in the United Kingdom, the United States, Israel, Australia, Denmark, and Turkey. Yonga Mobilya Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1974 and is based in Denizli, Turkey.
